LanguageData.VFEE_AriadneArchduchess.label: Ariadne Archduchess
LanguageData.VFEE_AriadneArchduchess.description: Ariadne got tired of the unpredictability of the nobility, and whilst she will create a story of increasing tension, she will force dangerous events on you as your wealth increases. After all, it’s not fun to kick someone while they’re down.
